name: kommentio
description: Open-source embeddable comment widget - Ad-free alternative to Disqus

scripts.build:local: npm run build && npm run build:widget && npm run prepare:docs
scripts.prepare:docs: cp dist/docs/index.html docs/index.html && mkdir -p docs/widget && cp -r dist/widget/* docs/widget/ && cp dist/widget/kommentio.iife.js docs/kommentio.js
scripts.dev:prod: npm run build:local && npm run serve:prod
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/.vite dist .vite && npm cache clean --force
